titles.title: CB 131 Hallelujah I want to sing all about it

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah I want to sing all about Him
Hallelujah I want to shout all about Him
Hallelujah I can't live without it
Praise God praise God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now I'm living in a new creation
Now I'm drinking at the well of salvation
Now there is no condemnation praise God
